channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gen Zers are so disillusioned with the economy that they think it’s OK to commit fraud
item.description: A third of Gen Zers either know someone who has participated in payment fraud or have done so themselves.

item.title: Meta accused of breaching EU antitrust rules over ad-supported subscription service
item.description: Meta was on Monday accused by EU regulators of failing to comply with the bloc's landmark antitrust rules over its ad-supported social networking service.

item.title: BlackRock agrees to acquire privately held U.K.-based Preqin for $3.2 billion
Credit card gun sales are the new policy flight after California requires Visa and Mastercard to provide special codes for gun store buys, while Georgia and others ban the practice
item.description: Over the past 16 months, 17 states with GOP-led legislatures have passed measures prohibiting a firearms store code or limiting its use.

item.title: Monday's analyst calls: Nvidia price target hike, shoe stock to rally more than 50%
item.description: A major chipmaker and a shoe maker were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Monday.

item.title: French stocks surge by most in nearly two years after first round of election
Biden’s family tells him to remain in race despite dreadful debate performance, and some are now criticizing how staff prepared him
item.description: While the president was huddled with his family, prominent Democrats rallied to deliver a public show of support for his campaign on Sunday.

item.title: Google invests in BlackRock-backed Taiwanese solar developer to boost energy capacity amid AI boom
item.description: Google announced it is partnering with BlackRock to develop a 1 gigawatt pipeline of new solar capacity in Taiwan.

item.title: Boeing agrees to buy supplier Spirit Aerosystems for $4.7 billion
LVMH billionaire Bernard Arnault enters race to acquire Venice’s iconic Hotel Bauer—with bids rising over €275 million
item.description: The Hotel Bauer was one of the crown jewels of the Austrian mogul Rene Benko's real estate empire.

item.title: Collapsed bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox is about to unload $9 billion of coins — here's what it means
item.description: Bitcoin investors are spooked by anticipation of an imminent Mt. Gox payout to victims of a 2014 hack on the exchange that led to its collapse.

item.title: Consumer stocks rallied in June — but U.S. households are still feeling pinched
French market rebounds and euro edges up after France’s far-right National Rally clinches first-round vote
item.description: Shares of France's Societe Generale, BNP Paribas and Credit Agricole all jumped post election results.

item.title: French stocks jump as far right takes election lead but seen falling short of majority
item.description: La Banque Postale Asset Management's Sebastian Paris Horvitz said the results indicate a hung parliament is most likely — the "least bad" option for markets.

item.title: What's worth streaming in July: Olympics boost Peacock, but Netflix is golden
